title: Kris Boyson's scorching comeback as Katie Price claims her exes made money off her
text:

Katie Price's on-and-off-again beau Kris Boyson has shut down the glamour model after she claimed all her exes have made money off of her.

The personal trainer was not standing for it when Katie uploaded a clip from her YouTube channel, onto her Instagram account on Sunday, where she was seen having her hair styled and chatting to stylist Mel about her former flames.

"I wanted to do this test Mel, on looking at my exes, who they were before they met me and what they did. So now, they’re not with me and the difference of their lives," the mother-of-five began.

"They have become Mr Price’s, tried to be famous, end up getting Instagram posts off the back of me, getting all jobs from me and being able to earn money from stories and all that with always mentioning my name."

Katie's clip did not sit well with Kris, who took to the comments with a scorching comeback, where he defended himself as a "respectful gentleman" who would "never become a Mr Price".

(Image: Instagram)

He typed, for her 2.1 million followers to see: "Don’t test me mate! I’m a respectful Gentleman! I do the same job I’ve done since before I met ya. I done TV before I met ya."

He continued: "I ain’t done paid Instagram posts, I ain’t sold stories, ain’t tried becoming a model and I’d never become a Mr Price thanks. I’ll always be a Boyson!"

Katie was quick to respond to Kris and backtrack by saying it was about her "ex husbands" - Peter Andre, Alex Reid and Kieran Hayler.

She explained: "@krisboyson it was the ex husbands as they all had absolutely nothing at all when I met them but you my darling are perfect."

It comes after Katie and Kris recently reunited after she had a brief fling with toyboy Charles Drury.

Katie and Kris previously threw in the towel on their relationship and engagement after she dumped him by text.

She was snapped on a night out in Turkey looking a bit worse for wear during her whirlwind romance with 22 year-old Charles.

(Image: Tim P. Whitby/Getty Images)

Since their reconciliation, the surgically enhanced star has revealed that she hopes they will tie the knot next year and welcome a baby.

Chatting with Flex FM , Katie laughed: "Next year maybe a baby and a wedding."

She's already got five kids - Harvey , 17, with Dwight Yorke, Junior, 14 and Princess, 12, with ex-husband Peter , and Jett, six and Bunny, five, with another ex-hubby, Kieran .
description: The personal trainer hit back at the glamour model when she said her exes have made money off her fame
